src: The most important goals were to prevent the risk of infection in the professionals, in families and their newborns, as well as to ensure the same effectiveness for the early detection of the diseases included in our programme.
tgt: Los objetivos más importantes eran prevenir el riesgo de infección en los profesionales, en las familias y en sus recién nacidos, así como garantizar la misma eficacia para la detección precoz de las enfermedades incluidas en nuestro programa.
bt_tgt: The most important objectives were to prevent the risk of infection in professionals, in families and in their newborns, as well as guarantee the same effectiveness for the early detection of diseases included in our program.
atomic_facts: prevent the risk of infection

src: To this end, the laboratory was reorganised by dividing the staff into groups and the spaces were redistributed.
tgt: Para ello, se reorganizó el laboratorio dividiendo al personal en grupos y se redistribuyeron los espacios.

src: It was also necessary to modify several protocols and circuits, especially for the management of early discharges from maternity centres, and for the collection of the necessary second samples (from newborns with inconclusive results or for low quality samples).
tgt: También fue necesario modificar varios protocolos y circuitos, especialmente para la gestión de las altas tempranas de las maternidades, y para la recogida de las segundas muestras necesarias (de recién nacidos con resultados no concluyentes o de baja calidad).
bt_tgt: It was also necessary to modify several protocols and circuits, especially for the management of early maternity highs, and for the collection of the second necessary samples (of newborns with non -conclusive or low quality results).

src: In the specific case of cystic fibrosis detection, the implementation of a new strategy meant a 100% reduction in the request for second samples and a 70% reduction in the age of diagnosis of the newborn.
tgt: En el caso específico de la detección de fibrosis quística, la implementación de una nueva estrategia significó una reducción del 100 % en la solicitud de segundas muestras y una reducción del 70 % en la edad de diagnóstico del recién nacido.
bt_tgt: In the specific case of cystic fibrosis detection, the implementation of a new strategy meant a 100% reduction in the request for second samples and a 70% reduction in the age of diagnosis of the newborn.

src: The present systematic review examined post-migration variables impacting upon mental health outcomes among asylum-seeking and refugee populations in Europe.

src: This study aimed to identify patients eligible for a 48-h stay after colorectal resection, to provide guidance for early discharge planning.
tgt: Este estudio tuvo como objetivo identificar a los pacientes aptos para una estancia de 48 horas después de la resección colorrectal, a fin de proporcionar orientación para planificar el alta temprana.
bt_tgt: This study aimed to identify patients suitable for a 48 -hour stay after colorectal resection, in order to provide guidance to plan early registration.

src: Overall and severe (Clavien-Dindo grade IIIb or above) postoperative complication and readmission rates were compared between patients who were discharged within 48 h and those who had hospital stay of 48 h or more.
tgt: Se compararon las tasas de complicaciones postoperatorias globales e intensas (grado de Clavien-Dindo IIIb o superior) y de reingresos entre los pacientes que fueron dados de alta en 48 h y los que tuvieron una estancia hospitalaria de 48 h o superior.
bt_tgt: The rates of global and intense postoperative complications were compared (degree of clavien-decinding or higher) and re-entering between patients who were discharged in 48 h and those who had a hospital stay of 48 h or higher.
atomic_facts: The Clavien-Dindo grade IIIb or above postoperative complication rates were compared.

src: Independent factors favouring a short hospital stay were age below 60 years (odds ratio (OR) 1·34; P = 0·002), ASA grade less than III (OR 1·42; P = 0·003), restrictive fluid management (less than 3000 ml on day of surgery: OR 1·46; P < 0·001), duration of surgery less than 180 min (OR 1·89; P < 0·001), minimally invasive approach (OR 1·92; P < 0·001) and wound contamination grade below III (OR 4·50; P < 0·001), whereas cancer diagnosis (OR 0·55; P < 0·001) and malnutrition
tgt: Los factores independientes que favorecieron una estancia hospitalaria corta fueron la edad inferior a 60 años (cociente de probabilidades [OR] de 1,34; p = 0,002), grado de AAS inferior a III (OR 1,42; P = 0,003), manejo restrictivo de líquidos (inferior a 3000 ml el día de la intervención: OR 1,46; P <0,001), duración de la intervención inferior a 180 min (OR 1,89; P <0,001), abordaje mínimamente invasivo (OR 1,92; P <0,001) y grado de contaminación de la herida inferior a III (OR 4,50; P <0,001), mientras que el diagnóstico de cáncer (OR 0,55; P <0,001) y la desnutrición
bt_tgt: The independent factors that favored a short hospital stay were the age of less than 60 years (ratio of probabilities [or] of 1.34; p = 0.002), degree of AAS less than III (or 1.42; p = 0.003), restrictive liquid management (less than 3000 ml on the day of the intervention: or 1.46; p <0.001), duration of the intervention less than 180 min (or 1.89; p <0.001), minimally invasive approach (or 1 , 92;
atomic_facts: Age below 60 years is associated with a short hospital stay (odds ratio (OR) 1·34; P = 0·002).
ASA grade less than III is associated with a short hospital stay (odds ratio (OR) 1·42; P = 0·003).
Restrictive fluid management less than 3000 ml on day of surgery is associated with a short hospital stay (odds ratio (OR) 1·46; P < 0·001).
Duration of surgery less than 180 min is associated with a short hospital stay (odds ratio (OR) 1·89; P < 0·001).
Minimally invasive approach is associated with a short hospital stay (odds ratio (OR) 1·92; P < 0·001).
Wound contamination grade below III is associated with a short hospital stay (odds ratio (OR) 4·50; P < 0·001).

src: In these patients, outpatient colorectal surgery should be feasible on a large scale with logistical optimization.

src: The current study contributes to a sparse literature on moderators of Functional Family Therapy (FFT) by examining whether responsiveness to FFT, measured by a broad range of outcomes, varies by adolescent gender, age, and their interaction.
tgt: El estudio actual contribuye a la escasa literatura sobre los moderadores de la Terapia familiar funcional (FFT) al examinar si la capacidad de respuesta a la FFT, medida por una amplia gama de resultados, varía según el sexo del adolescente, la edad y su interacción.
bt_tgt: The current study contributes to the low literature on the moderators of Functional Family Therapy (FFT) when examining whether the ability to respond to the FFT, measured by a wide range of results, varies according to the sex of the adolescent, age and its interaction .
atomic_facts: It examines whether responsiveness to FFT, measured by a broad range of outcomes, varies by adolescent gender, age, and their interaction.

src: This study was informed by 687 families (n, adolescents = 581; n, caregivers = 933) and utilized a pre-post comparison design.
tgt: En este estudio se contó con 687 familias (n, adolescentes = 581; n, cuidadores = 933) y se utilizó un diseño de comparación antes y después.
bt_tgt: This study included 687 families (n, adolescents = 581; n, caregivers = 933) and used a before-after comparison design.
atomic_facts: n, adolescents = 581
a pre-post comparison design was utilized.

src: Moderation analyses revealed that according to parent report, girls had significantly greater improvements in peer problems and family functioning, and boys benefited more in increased liking of school.
tgt: Los análisis de moderación revelaron que, según el informe de los padres, las niñas habían tenido una mejora considerablemente superior de los problemas con los compañeros y el funcionamiento de la familia, y los niños se beneficiaban más de una mayor simpatía hacia la escuela.
bt_tgt: Moderation analyses revealed that, according to parent report, girls had significantly greater improvement in peer problems and family functioning, and boys benefited more from increased school friendliness.

src: There were differential effects by age, such that older youth had less beneficial mental health outcomes and a smaller decrease in frequency of hash use.
tgt: Hubo efectos diferenciales por edad, de modo que los jóvenes de mayor edad tuvieron resultados de salud mental menos beneficiosos y una disminución menor en la frecuencia del consumo de hachís.
bt_tgt: There were differential effects by age, so that older young people had less beneficial mental results and a lower decrease in the frequency of hashish consumption.
atomic_facts: Older youth had less beneficial mental health outcomes.
A smaller decrease in frequency of hash use was observed in older youth.

src: The caregivers of 435 children (211 females, 224 males; mean age 12y; SD 3y 11mo; age range 5-18y) with intellectual disability and autism spectrum disorder, cerebral palsy, Down syndrome, or Rett syndrome reported on their child's functioning (dependence for managing personal needs, mobility, communication, eye contact when speaking), frequency of participation, and QoL. Linear regression and mediation analyses were used to evaluate the relationships between child functioning, participation, and QoL. Children with greater dependency for managing personal needs and limited eye contact when speaking experienced poorer QoL. Less impaired functioning was associated with more frequent participation, which, in turn, was associated with a 3-point gain in QoL for each additional point in frequency of participation (coefficient=2.67, 95% confidence interval 1.56-3.78).
tgt: Los cuidadores de 435 niños (211 mujeres, 224 hombres; edad media 12 años; DE de 3 años y 11 meses; intervalo de edad 5-18 años) con discapacidad intelectual y trastorno del espectro autista, parálisis cerebral, síndrome de Down o síndrome de Rett facilitaron información sobre la funcionalidad de sus hijos (dependencia para gestionar necesidades personales, movilidad, comunicación, contacto visual al hablar), la frecuencia de participación y la CdV. Se utilizaron análisis de mediación y regresión lineal para evaluar las relaciones entre la funcionalidad, la participación y la CdV del niño. Los niños con mayor dependencia para gestionar sus necesidades personales y con contacto visual limitado al hablar presentaron una CdV peor. Una funcionalidad menos deteriorada se asoció a una participación más frecuente, lo que, a su vez, se asoció a una ganancia de 3 puntos en la calidad de vida por cada punto adicional en la frecuencia de participación (coeficiente = 2,67, intervalo de confianza al 95 %: 1,56-3,78).
bt_tgt: Caregivers of 435 children (211 female, 224 male; mean age 12 years; SD 3 years 11 months; age range 5–18 years) with intellectual disability and autism spectrum disorder, cerebral palsy, Down syndrome, or Rett syndrome provided information on their child's functioning (dependency in managing personal needs, mobility, communication, eye contact when speaking), frequency of participation, and QoL. Mediation and linear regression analyses were used to assess relationships among child functionality, participation, and QoL. Children with greater dependency in managing personal needs and limited eye contact when speaking had poorer QoL. Less impaired functionality was associated with more frequent participation, which in turn was associated with a 3-point gain in quality of life for each additional point in frequency of participation (coefficient = 2.67, 95% confidence interval: 1.56–3.78).

src: To investigate associations between functioning, community participation, and quality of life (QoL) and identify whether participation mediates the effects of functioning on QoL.
tgt: Investigar las asociaciones entre la funcionalidad, la participación comunitaria y la calidad de vida (CdV) e identificar si la participación influye en los efectos del funcionamiento sobre la CdV.
bt_tgt: To investigate the associations between functionality, community participation and quality of life (QoL) and to identify whether participation influences the effects of functioning on QoL.
atomic_facts: The study aims to identify whether participation mediates the effects of functioning on QoL.

src: Greater levels of impairments with poorer functioning, notably a high level of dependence, were associated with poorer QoL. Poorer QoL can be partly explained by less frequent community participation.
tgt: Los mayores niveles de deficiencia con peor funcionamiento, especialmente un elevado nivel de dependencia, se asociaron a una CdV peor, que puede explicarse en parte por una participación menos frecuente en la comunidad.

errors_tgt.term: mayores niveles de deficiencia con peor funcionamiento

bt_tgt: Higher levels of impairment with poorer functioning, especially a high level of dependency, were associated with poorer QoL, which may be partly explained by less frequent participation in the community.
atomic_facts: Poorer QoL was associated with higher levels of dependence.
Poorer QoL can be partly explained by less frequent community participation.

src: To investigate associations between functioning, community participation, and quality of life (QoL) and identify whether participation mediates the effects of functioning on QoL.
tgt: Investigar las asociaciones entre la funcionalidad, la participación comunitaria y la calidad de vida (CdV) e identificar si la participación influye en los efectos del funcionamiento sobre la CdV.
bt_tgt: Investigating associations between functionality, community participation and quality of life (CDV) and identify whether participation influences the effects of CDV operation.
atomic_facts: Investigate associations between functioning, community participation, and quality of life (QoL).
Identify whether participation mediates the effects of functioning on QoL.

src: The data are from the Birth in Brazil study, a national survey consisting of 23,894 postpartum women and their newborn infants.
tgt: Los datos provienen del estudio Nacimiento en Brasil, una encuesta nacional que consta de 23.894 mujeres posparto y sus recién nacidos.
bt_tgt: Data come from the Birth in Brazil study, a national survey consisting of 23,894 postpartum women and their newborns.
atomic_facts: The Birth in Brazil study is a national survey.
The survey includes 23,894 postpartum women and their newborn infants.

src: The data are from the Birth in Brazil study, a national survey consisting of 23,894 postpartum women and their newborn infants.
tgt: Los datos provienen del estudio Nacimiento en Brasil, una encuesta nacional que consta de 23.894 mujeres posparto y sus recién nacidos.
bt_tgt: Data come from the Birth in Brazil study, a national survey consisting of 23,894 postpartum women and their newborns.

src: The study revealed social, economic, and maternal care disparities between the women according to age bracket.
tgt: El estudio reveló disparidades sociales, económicas y de atención materna entre las mujeres según el tramo de edad.
bt_tgt: The study revealed social, economic and maternal care disparities among women according to age group.
atomic_facts: The study identified age bracket as a factor in social, economic and maternal care disparities.

src: The highest proportions of teenage mothers were in the least developed regions of Brazil (North and Northeast) and in the poorest economic classes.
tgt: Las mayores proporciones de madres adolescentes se encontraban en las regiones menos desarrolladas de Brasil (Norte y Nordeste) y en las clases económicas más pobres.
bt_tgt: The highest proportions of teenage mothers were found in the less developed regions of Brazil (North and Northeast) and in the poorest economic classes.
atomic_facts: The highest proportions of teenage mothers were in the least developed regions of Brazil (North and Northeast).
The highest proportions of teenage mothers were in the poorest economic classes.

src: The study outcome was gestational age, considering all the premature births (gestational age < 37 weeks) and term births (gestational age 37 weeks to 41 weeks and 6 days).
tgt: El resultado del estudio fue la edad gestacional, considerando todos los partos prematuros (edad gestacional < 37 semanas) y nacidos a término (edad gestacional 37 semanas a 41 semanas y 6 días).
bt_tgt: The outcome of the study was gestational age, considering all premature births (gestational age < 37 weeks) and full-term births (gestational age 37 weeks to 41 weeks and 6 days).
atomic_facts: The study considers all premature births (gestational age < 37 weeks) and term births (gestational age 37 weeks to 41 weeks and 6 days).

src: After matching for socioeconomic and obstetric care characteristics, the highest odds of spontaneous prematurity were seen in younger adolescents compared to older adolescents (OR = 1.49; 95%CI: 1.07-2.06), and young adults (OR = 2.38; 95%CI: 1.82-3.12).
tgt: Después de emparejar las características socioeconómicas y de atención obstétrica, las probabilidades más altas de prematuridad espontánea se observaron en adolescentes más jóvenes en comparación con adolescentes mayores (OR = 1,49; IC del 95 %: 1,07-2,06) y adultos jóvenes (OR = 2,38; IC del 95 %: 1,82-3,12).
bt_tgt: After matching for socioeconomic and obstetric care characteristics, the highest odds of spontaneous prematurity were observed in younger adolescents compared with older adolescents (OR = 1.49; 95% CI: 1.07-2.06) and young adults (OR = 2.38; 95% CI: 1.82-3.12).
atomic_facts: The odds of spontaneous prematurity were highest in younger adolescents.

src: The study aims to evaluate the association between teenage pregnancy and prematurity.
tgt: El estudio tiene como objetivo evaluar la asociación entre el embarazo en la adolescencia y la prematuridad.
bt_tgt: The study aims to evaluate the association between teenage pregnancy and prematurity.
atomic_facts: The study aims to evaluate the association between teenage pregnancy and prematurity.

src: The information was obtained from interviews with the mothers during their postpartum hospital stay.

bt_tgt: Information was obtained from interviews with mothers during their postpartum hospital stay.

src: There are a variety of instruments and indicators to assess continuity of care; however there is a lack of those that describe the result of coordination between the health care levels.
tgt: Hay una variedad de instrumentos e indicadores para evaluar la continuidad de la atención; sin embargo faltan aquellos que describen el resultado de la coordinación entre los niveles de atención de salud.
bt_tgt: There are a variety of instruments and indicators to assess continuity of care; however, those that describe the outcome of coordination between levels of health care are lacking.
atomic_facts: However, there is a lack of those that describe the result of coordination between the health care levels.

src: There are a variety of instruments and indicators to assess continuity of care; however there is a lack of those that describe the result of coordination between the health care levels.

src: Two indicators were analyzed: the outcome of the reference to general surgery, categorized as resolved, withdrawal and not resolved; and the time of solution of the surgical problem, which measures the median in calendar days from the issuance of the reference to the counter-reference for the reason of original sending.
tgt: Se analizaron dos indicadores: el resultado de la referencia a cirugía general, categorizado como resuelto, retiro y no resuelto; y el tiempo de solución del problema quirúrgico, que mide la mediana en días naturales desde la emisión de la referencia hasta la contrarreferencia por motivo de envío original.
bt_tgt: Two indicators were analyzed: the result of the referral to general surgery, categorized as resolved, withdrawn, and unresolved; and the time to resolve the surgical problem, which measures the median in calendar days from the issuance of the referral to the counter-referral for the reason for the original referral.
atomic_facts: Two indicators were analyzed:
the outcome of the reference to general surgery, categorized as resolved, withdrawal and not resolved;
and the time of solution of the surgical problem, which measures the median in calendar days from the issuance of the reference to the counter-reference for the reason of original sending.

src: The indicators were compared by characteristics of the patient and the first level physician.
tgt: Los indicadores fueron comparados por las características del paciente y del médico de primer nivel.
bt_tgt: The indicators were compared by patient and primary care physician characteristics.
atomic_facts: The comparison was done by characteristics of the patient and the first level physician.

src: The overall solution time of the surgical problem in the medical unit is within the range built with previous studies, but in specific diagnoses there are significant variations.
tgt: El tiempo total de solución del problema quirúrgico en la unidad médica está dentro del rango establecido con estudios previos, pero en los diagnósticos específicos existen variaciones significativas.
bt_tgt: The total time to solve the surgical problem in the medical unit is within the range established by previous studies, but there are significant variations in specific diagnoses.
atomic_facts: There are significant variations in solution times for specific diagnoses.

src: The frequency of solution of the surgical problem was high for diagnoses of greater risk.
tgt: La frecuencia de solución del problema quirúrgico fue alta para diagnósticos de mayor riesgo.
bt_tgt: The frequency of surgical problem resolution was high for higher risk diagnoses.
atomic_facts: The frequency of solution of the surgical problem is high.
The surgical problem has high diagnoses of risk.

src: To show two indicators that summarizes the result of the complete circuit primary level-secondary level-primary level.

src: No statistically significant differences were found according the evaluated characteristics.

bt_tgt: No statistically significant differences were found according to the characteristics evaluated.

src: In the last decades, only few improvements have been made in the comprehension of bladder cancer tumor leading to few improvements in the development of new diagnostic and therapeutic approaches.
tgt: En las últimas décadas, solo se han logrado pocas mejoras en la comprensión de los tumores de cáncer de vejiga, lo que conduce a pocas mejoras en el desarrollo de nuevos abordajes diagnósticos y terapéuticos.

errors_tgt.term: solo se han logrado pocas mejoras

bt_tgt: In recent decades, only few improvements have been achieved in the understanding of bladder cancer tumors, leading to few improvements in the development of new diagnostic and therapeutic approaches.
atomic_facts: In the last decades, few improvements have been made in the comprehension of bladder cancer tumor.

src: However, in the last years several step forwards in the field of precision medicine have been made.
tgt: Sin embargo, en los últimos años se ha avanzado bastante en el campo de la Medicina de Precisión.
bt_tgt: However, in recent years there has been considerable progress in the field of Precision Medicine.
atomic_facts: Several step forwards in the field of precision medicine have been made in the last years.

src: In this review we focused on some of these elements such as the available biomarkers, the role of enhanced transurethral resection of the bladder and the role of the molecular classification in defining prognosis and therapeutic approaches in bladder cancer patients.
tgt: En esta revisión nos enfocamos en algunos de estos elementos, como los biomarcadores disponibles, el papel de la resección transuretral mejorada de la vejiga y el papel de la clasificación molecular en la definición del pronóstico y los abordajes terapéuticos en pacientes con cáncer de vejiga.
bt_tgt: In this review we focus on some of these elements, such as the available biomarkers, the role of improved transurethral resection of the bladder and the role of the molecular classification in the definition of the prognosis and therapeutic approaches in patients with bladder cancer.
atomic_facts: This review focused on some elements
The available biomarkers are mentioned
The enhanced transurethral resection of the bladder is mentioned
The role of molecular classification in defining prognosis and therapeutic approaches in bladder cancer patients is mentioned

src: Although several progresses have been made, at the time none of the existing biomarkers appear to be able to safely avoid the need of cystoscopy during the follow up of bladder cancer patients.
tgt: Si bien se han realizado varios avances, en este momento ninguno de los biomarcadores existentes parece poder evitar de forma segura la necesidad de realizar una cistoscopia durante el seguimiento de los pacientes con cáncer de vejiga.
bt_tgt: Although several advances have been made, at this time none of the existing biomarkers seems to be able to safely avoid the need to perform a cystoscopy during the monitoring of bladder cancer patients.
atomic_facts: At the time, none of the existing biomarkers appear to be able to safely avoid the need of cystoscopy during the follow up of bladder cancer patients.

src: Enhanced transurethral resection technique can in some cases reduce the risk of recurrence during follow up, although its impact on survival outcomes is still under debate.
tgt: La técnica de resección transuretral mejorada puede reducir en algunos casos el riesgo de recurrencia durante el seguimiento, aunque su impacto en los resultados de supervivencia sigue siendo objeto de debate.
bt_tgt: The improved transurethral resection technique can reduce the risk of recurrence during monitoring in some cases, although its impact on survival results remains a debate.
atomic_facts: Enhanced transurethral resection technique can reduce the risk of recurrence during follow up.
Its impact on survival outcomes is still under debate.

src: Finally, the molecular classification of the bladder cancer represents one of the most exciting novelty in this field, improving consistently the knowledge of bladder cancer.
tgt: Por último, la clasificación molecular del cáncer de vejiga representa una de las novedades más interesantes en este campo, ya que amplía constantemente el conocimiento sobre el cáncer de vejiga.
bt_tgt: Finally, the molecular classification of bladder cancer represents one of the most interesting novelties in this field, since it constantly expands knowledge about bladder cancer.
atomic_facts: The molecular classification of bladder cancer represents one of the most exciting novelty in this field.
Improving consistently the knowledge of bladder cancer.

src: Transurethral resection of the bladder represents a fundamental diagnostic and therapeutic step in the management of bladder cancer and these techniques can successfully improve its outcomes.
tgt: La resección transuretral de la vejiga representa un paso fundamental en el diagnóstico y el tratamiento del cáncer de vejiga, y estas técnicas pueden mejorar con éxito sus resultados.
bt_tgt: Transuretral resection of the bladder represents a fundamental step in the diagnosis and treatment of bladder cancer, and these techniques can successfully improve their results.
atomic_facts: Transurethral resection of the bladder is a fundamental diagnostic and therapeutic step.
Transurethral resection of the bladder can successfully improve outcomes in bladder cancer management.

src: Material and methods: a cross-sectional and associative study was performed in a total of 370 schoolchildren (44.9 % girls) aged 6-13 (8.7 ± 1.8) years.
tgt: Material y métodos: se realizó un estudio transversal y asociativo en un total de 370 niños en edad escolar (44,9 %, niñas) de entre 6 y 13 años (8,7 ± 1,8) años.
bt_tgt: Material and methods: A cross-sectional and associative study was carried out in a total of 370 school-age children (44.9%, girls) between 6 and 13 years (8.7 ± 1.8) years.
atomic_facts: A cross-sectional and associative study was performed.
370 schoolchildren were included in the study.
44.9% of the schoolchildren were girls.
The age range was 6-13 years.
The average age was 8.7 years and the standard deviation was 1.8 years.

src: Results: for boys, those who did not meet these guidelines presented lower chances of eating vegetables regularly (OR = 0.50; 95 % CI = 0.28-0.89) or more than once a day (OR = 0.43; 95 % CI = 0.22-0.85).
tgt: Resultados: en el caso de niños varones, los que no cumplieron estas pautas presentaron menores posibilidades de comer verduras con regularidad (OR = 0,50; IC del 95 % = 0,28-0,89) o más de una vez al día (OR = 0,43; IC del 95 % = 0,22-0,85).
bt_tgt: Results: Among boys, those who did not meet these guidelines were less likely to eat vegetables regularly (OR = 0.50; 95% CI = 0.28-0.89) or more than once a day (OR = 0.43; 95% CI = 0.22-0.85).
atomic_facts: For boys, those who did not meet these guidelines presented lower chances of eating vegetables regularly (OR = 0.50; 95% CI = 0.28-0.89).

src: Objective: the aim of this research was to explore the relationship between dietary pattern habits and compliance with screen-time guidelines in Spanish schoolchildren.
tgt: Objetivo: explorar la relación entre los hábitos alimentarios y el cumplimiento de las pautas sobre el tiempo frente a la pantalla en niños españoles en edad escolar.
bt_tgt: Objective: To explore the relationship between dietary habits and compliance with screen time guidelines in Spanish school-aged children.
atomic_facts: Objective: the aim of this research was to explore the relationship between dietary pattern habits and compliance with screen-time guidelines in Spanish schoolchildren.
